ðŸ“– Summary: Rerun is a visualization tool and data stack for multimodal data, offering SDKs in C++, Python, and Rust. It allows users to log and visualize data streams like images, point clouds, and text in real-time. The tool also provides a dataframe API for querying logged data, making it suitable for robotics, AI, and other data-intensive applications.
